name: Crystals of Time (itch)
description:
The meteor is moving towards the planet!
Collect the purple crystals in order to stop the meteor.

Controls:
Arrow keys - movement

Used premade assets:
1 unnamed music track, made by me

I can say that this game perfectly represents my stress and anxiety during the making of this game lol. This ended up taking over 4 hours but still, I've managed to finish this.
